page.title: 12MAJOR LOCAL ISSUES-BEDWORTH
page.content: Bedworth's main concern is { {UNEMPLOYMENT.}The town has 2,570 unemployed & the Borough's youth jobless rate is the highest in Warwickshire(only 12% of school- leavers find full-time jobs).Various schemes help the unemployed acquire new skills-Bedworth Information Technology Centre has 22 young trainees learning computing.The towns changing face excites interest.The Old School House,built 100 yrs ago,is scheduled for demolition;conservation group{THE BEDWORTH SOCIETY}wants it preserved as a Heritage Centre. An increasing problem is{VANDALISM}. Issues such as petty theft,defacing property & needless criminal damage are common.Bedworth is served by several{NEWSPAPERS}which publicise town issues.The Evening Telegraph & The Evening Tribune are 2 of them.
